original: Cytopathology is a branch of pathology that focuses on the examination of individual cells or small clusters of cells to aid in the diagnosis of various medical conditions. It is primarily utilized in the diagnosis of cancer but also plays a significant role in identifying certain infectious diseases, inflammatory conditions, thyroid lesions, and diseases affecting sterile body cavities such as the peritoneal, pleural, and cerebrospinal

It is primarily utilized in the diagnosis of cancer but also plays a significant part with identifying certain infectious diseases, inflammatory conditions, thyroid lesions, and diseases affecting sterile body cavities such for the peritoneal, pleural, and cerebrospinal
